Question.Subject: Help findin a restaurant for anniversary in SF?
Question.Content: It's my two year anniversary in a few days and was wondering if somone could tell me about a great restaurant in sf or other nearby cities

ChosenAnswer: I like Hayes Street Grill....another plus, it's right by Civic Center, so you can take a romantic walk around the Opera House, City Hall, Symphony Auditorium...all very beautiful.

Answers.Answer: Prime Ribs its kind of expensive though
